entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
